evilpauze.welcome_message:
Please take five minutes to read over <#671228366606696468>, <#714663070169038879> and <#662753822921326592>, then reply in this channel with `verify me` to enter the server!

If you are having issues with the verification process, please contact a staff member in DMs so we can verify you manually.
evilpauze.cooldown_message: We consider five minutes to be the minimum time you need to properly acknowledge the information channel and the server rules.
